typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as integer,
		PhoneNumber as long,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	dateFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd']) ~> varncustomer
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		UpdatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> fourthcoffedd
varncustomer derive(SourceSystemId = 3,
		GlobalCustomerID = concat('3',CustomerID)) ~> SourceSystemId
SourceSystemId select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemCustomerID = CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		SourceSystemId,
		GlobalCustomerID
	)) ~> vanfinalcustomer
